template <typename BlockT, dimension_type OrigDim>
class vsip::impl::Redim_block
File: ../../../vsip/opt/expr/eval_dense.hpp

Redimension block.

Provides a 1-dimensional view of a multidimensional block. Intended for use when a multidimensional block refers to dense data, but does not support 1,x-dimensional access (for example a Sliced_block). Redim_block's direct data interface requires underlying block to be dense, but get/put work regardless of the layout.
